dataSource.name: Q_ligne
dataSource.select:
select C.SOCCONT , S.SOCLIB , C.NUMCONT, decode(top30,'N',substr(c.cav,2,2),'O',decode(c.cav,'000',null,c.cav)) cav,
C.CODSG, C.CCOUTHT, C.CDATDEB, C.CDATFIN, L.LRESDEB , L.LRESFIN , L.IDENT, substr(R.RNOM,1,15) RNOM ,L.LCCOUACT , pack_situation_p.verif_situ_ligcont_rep(l.ident,l.soccont,l.lresdeb,l.lresfin) as LCPREST--L.LCPREST , C.CTYPFACT, C.SIREN ,l.mode_contractuel from CONTRAT C, LIGNE_CONT L, RESSOURCE R, SOCIETE S,MODE_CONTRACTUEL md where C.SOCCONT = S.SOCCODE and C.SOCCONT = L.SOCCONT and C.NUMCONT = L.NUMCONT and C.CAV = L.CAV and L.IDENT = R.IDENT and md.code_contractuel (+)= l.mode_contractuel &P_WHERE order by C.SOCCONT, L.NUMCONT, L.CAV , C.CODSG, C.CDATDEB, L.IDENT

dataDescriptor.expression: decode ( top30 , 'N' , substr ( c.cav , 2 , 2 ) , 'O' , decode ( c.cav , '000' , null , c.cav ) )

function.name: afterpform
beforereport
rtrimetoile
f_cfraisformattrigger
r_1formattrigger
